title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;
BPA Free, heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle, easy to clean
descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - the ultimate collection of 14 essential kitchen gadgets for all your cooking needs! Crafted from high-quality, food-grade silicone with a stainless steel core, these utensils are heat-resistant up to 446°F, ensuring you can use them in even the hottest cooking environments.

Featuring a stylish pink design and wooden handles, these kitchen tools are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. The set includes a Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Small Silicone Spatula, and a convenient Utensil Holder.

The one-piece design and no-gap molding ensure that these utensils are easy to clean and won't harbor bacteria or food particles. Plus, the wooden handles provide a comfortable grip and prevent heat transfer, ensuring that your hands stay safe while cooking.

This set is perfect for use with nonstick cookware and is BPA-free, ensuring that it won't react with your food or leach harmful chemicals. While it's easy to clean, please note that it's not dishwasher safe. For best results, soak the utensils in water for half an hour before use to remove the original silica gel smell.

With a quick after-sales response time of within 12 hours, you can trust that oannao is committed to providing exceptional customer service. Upgrade your kitchen today with this high-quality Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set!
